SA15n1253:4: iha khalu pramāṇamātre na kecid vipratipadyante |
SA15n1253:8: bruvatā niyataṃ kiñcit sādhyaṃ vā bādhyameva vā ||
SA15n1253:13: sādhyaṃ na kiñciditi ced bādhāyā api sādhyatā |
SA15n1253:14: sā'pi neti vaco vyarthaṃ praśnamātre'pi kiṃ phalam ||
SA15n1253:18: saṃvṛtāvapi neṣṭaṃ ced vadan jetā yathā tathā ||
SA15n1253:19: saṃvṛtiśca vinā mānaṃ vāṅmātreṇa na sidhyati |
SA15n1253:23: bhāvābhāvavyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ ||
SA15n1253:29: tacchāstre hi pratyakṣetarasāmānyayoḥ pramāṇetaravidhānaṃ lakṣaṇapraṇayanato vidhātavyam |
SA15n1253:30: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣe dharmiṇi lakṣye prāmāṇye pratyetavye svabhāvo hetuḥ |
SA15n1253:47: prathamapakṣe nīlatvavad dṛśyatvasyāpi sādhāraṇatvādekagocaro'rthaḥ sarvagocaraḥ syāt |
SA15n1253:49: dvitīyapakṣe tu kathamanyasmin jñānasvabhāve draṣṭṛtve satyanyasyāsamba(ddha)
SA15n1253:53: anabhyupagame draṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ ca na saṃbhavatīti kiṃ kenākṣipyatām |
SA15n1253:54: bhavatu vā prakārāntareṇāpi draṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvastathāpi bhede satyavyabhicārastadutpattireva prāptinimittam |
SA15n1253:55: sā ca prāpaṇaśaktiḥ pratyakṣānumānayoraviśiṣṭeti pramāṇe eva |
SA15n1253:57: tathā hi śabdāccodanārūpādasannikṛṣṭe'rthe svargādau yajjñānamutpadyate tadapi śābdaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇameva |
SA15n1253:61: tatra yadā śabdasamutthaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadopādānādibuddhiḥ phalam |
SA15n1253:62: yadā tu śabdastadā tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ phalamiti |
SA15n1253:70: āptaśca sākṣātkṛtaheyopādeyatattvo yathādṛṣṭasya cārthasyācikhyāsayā prayukta upadeṣṭā abhidhīyate |
SA15n1253:77: pratiyogyantare dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayaitatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo'sau ityasannikṛṣṭe'rthe yāṃ buddhimutpādayati tadupamānaṃ pramāṇamiti |
SA15n1253:80: tenāyamarthaḥ - yathā gavaye dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ gāṃ smarato manuṣyasya etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo'sau gauriti buddhimutpādayatīti |
SA15n1253:85: pratyakṣe'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake |
SA15n1253:87: pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe ca sādṛśye gavi ca smṛte |
SA15n1253:94: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasya tasmād gavayādeḥ sādhyasya saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhasya sādhanaṃ siddhistadupamānaphalam |
SA15n1253:97: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam,
SA15n1253:99: gavayaśabdavācyamarthama jānāno vanecaramanyaṃ vā tajjñaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
SA15n1253:101: tena cādiṣṭaṃ yathā gaustathā gavaya iti |
SA15n1253:102: tasya śrutātideśavākyasya kasyāñcidaraṇyānyāmupagatasyātideśavākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri yad gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ tatprathamata evāsau gavayaśabdavācyo'rtha iti pratipattiṃ prastuvānamupamānaṃ pramāṇamiti |
SA15n1253:104: arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho'nyathā nopadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ parikalpayati |
SA15n1253:106: yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyārthasya parikalpanā |
SA15n1253:108: pratyakṣādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhoḥ yo'rthaḥ sa yena vinā na yujyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattiriti |
SA15n1253:120: prayogaḥ - yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyam |
SA15n1253:122: apratibaddhāśca bahirarthe vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1253:136: tathaivaite vaidikāḥ śabdāstādātmyatadutpattiviyuktā api yogyatāmātreṇātīndriyamarthaṃ bodhayiṣyanti tatkathaṃ tādātmyatadutpattivirahamātreṇāpratibandho yenaivaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ sidhyatīti |
SA15n1253:138: yataścakṣurindriyamapi rasādiparihāreṇa rūpa eva prakāśakatvena pratiniyataṃ tatkāryatvāt |
SA15n1253:142: tasmād rūpād yogyadeśasannihitāt tajjñānajananayogyatāmāsādya cakṣū rūpajñānamutpādayattatkāryamiti vyaktamavasīyate |
SA15n1253:146: ayameva tarhi niyamaḥ kuto yad rūpeṇaiva cakṣurūpakartavyam,
SA15n1253:149: hanta tarhi yathopakāryatvaṃ prati niyamaścakṣuṣo rūpeṇa,
SA15n1253:150: tathā śabdānāmapi svābhāvika evāstu bahirarthapratyāyananiyama iti |
SA15n1253:153: tathā hi svābhāvikatvaṃ vastudharmasyānujānānaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ - kiṃ svābhāvika iti svato bhavati,
SA15n1253:163: brūmaḥ - cakṣūḥ khalu svahetunā janyamānaṃ tādṛśameva janitam yadrūpopakartavyameva bhavati |
SA15n1253:165: śabdānāmapi sa svabhāvaḥ svahetupratibaddho yenaite bāhyārthāvyabhicāriṇa iti cet |
SA15n1253:173: yathā cakṣuḥ svaheto rūpaprakāśakamutpannaṃ sat prakāśayatyeva rūpamasaṅketavido'pi,
SA15n1253:174: na ca śabdāduccaritāt prāgapratītasamayasyāpi viśeṣāvagamaḥ samasti |
SA15n1253:176: atha svahetubhirevāyamīdṛśasteṣāṃ svabhāvo datto yena te saṃketaviśeṣasahāyā eva kamapyarthamavabodhayanti |
SA15n1253:180: na hi kṣityādyapekṣeṇa bījena svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvenotpannena rāsabhaḥ śakyo janayitum,
SA15n1253:185: yadā hi saṅketenāpuruṣārtha pratipādanamapi saṃbhāvyata eva,
SA15n1253:186: tadā na śakyamupakalpayituṃ kimayamabhimatasyaivārthasya dyotako na veti |
SA15n1253:187: tarhi vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bhaviṣyati | tathā cāha
SA15n1253:198: na hi viruddhasya sādharmyavati dharmiṇi sadbhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15n1253:207: na khalvayaṃ prādeśikaḥ pramāṇaśabdo jñāneṣu nirnibandhana eva,
SA15n1253:211: ataḥ pramāṇe dharmiṇi vipakṣe prāmāṇyasya viruddhavyāptasyopalambhena vipakṣe vyavacchedasiddhernānaikāntiko hetuḥ |
SA15n1253:213: tasmānnirastāśeṣadoṣeṇa hetunā yat prasiddhaṃ tadupādeyameva satām (iti)
SA15n1253:215: evaṃ ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ pramāṇye niraste tadutthaṃ jñānamapyapramāṇameva |
SA15n1253:216: āptapraṇītasya punarvacanasyārthāvyabhicāre tajjanmano jñānasyāvyabhicārasaṃbhave'pi na prāmāṇyamupagantuṃ śakyate,
SA15n1253:219: yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitaṃ na tat tena rūpeṇa vyavahriyate |
SA15n1253:224: tathā hi paracittavṛttayo'tīndriyatvānna pratyakṣasamadhigamyā iti kāyavāgvyavahārato'numātavyāḥ |
SA15n1253:225: tau ca kāyavāgvyavahārau buddhipūrvamanyathāpi kartuṃ śakyete |
SA15n1253:233: ato yadetasya prāmāṇyaprasiddhyarthaṃ vācaspatiprabhṛtīnāṃ valgitaṃ tadaprāptāvasarameva |
SA15n1253:234: evaṃ pratyayoditamapi bhaṭṭābhimataṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇyaṃ vyastamiti boddhavyam |
SA15n1253:235: tasmāt sthitametat na śābdaṃ bahirarthe pramāṇamastīti |
SA15n1253:240: yasya na viṣayavattvaṃ na tasya prāmāṇyam |
SA15n1253:245: tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayo varṇyate |
SA15n1253:252: yadi sadṛśātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu dṛśyaṃ syāt,
SA15n1253:259: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇoghaṭata eva iti na sādṛśyamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavati |
SA15n1253:263: tataśca sādṛśyasyāsiddherna tadviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayaḥ |
SA15n1253:268: tathā hi prāmāṇyābhāve sādhye pramāṇyameva vipakṣaḥ |
SA15n1253:271: tadayaṃ viruddhavyāptopalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamāno viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prāmāṇyābhāvalakṣaṇa eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddhiḥ |
SA15n1253:277: sa hi saṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ bhinno'bhinno vā |
SA15n1253:281: na ca yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśāntaramantareṇa prakāśate tathā saṃbandho'pi saṃbandhāntaramantareṇa saṃbaddho bhaviṣyatīti vaktumucitam |
SA15n1253:282: pramāṇasiddhe hi vasturūpe'yamasya svabhāva iti varṇyate |
SA15n1253:287: ayamanayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbaddhāvetāviti tu buddhiḥ svahetubalāt saṃbaddhavastudvayādapi saṃbhāvyamānā na saṃbandhamākṣeptuṃ prabhavati |
SA15n1253:289: athābhinnaḥ tadā saṃbandhināveva kevalāviati na samākhyāsaṃbandho nāma,
SA15n1253:295: tadā yathā saṃbaddhapadārthasya svabhāvaḥ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇastathā tadapi rūpaṃ tadavyatibhinnaṃ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇamiti sa padārtho'bhimatapadārtheneva parairapi padārthaiḥ saha saṃbaddhaḥ syāt |
SA15n1253:298: saṃbaddhaṃ svayameva cennanu yathā taṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ
SA15n1253:299: pratyātmā jagatīmapi prati tathā tatkena yogo'sya na |
SA15n1253:300: saṃbandhe parato'pi tulyamakhilaṃ tenaiva cet saṃyamo
SA15n1253:301: hetuḥ kiṃ na niyāmakaḥ sa ca kathaṃ yogaḥ kvacinnāpare ||
SA15n1253:302: iti || tasmāt saṃbandhābhāvāt pūrvoktena nyāyena sārūpyābhāvāccāsiddhaṃ naiyāyikasyāpi nirviṣayamupamānaṃ pramāṇamato'nantareṇaiva vyāpakānupalambhena nirākṛtam |
SA15n1253:304: yadetat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣādipratīto yo'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya parikalpanamarthāpattirityatra vicāryate |
SA15n1253:305: yasyārthasya darśanād yo'rthaḥ parikalpyate tayoryadi pratibandho'stitadārthāpattiranumānameva |
SA15n1253:307: tathā hi pramāṇaparidṛṣṭo'rthaḥ kenacidvinā nopapadyata iti kuto labhyate,
SA15n1253:309: anyathā tena vinā nopapadyata ityahrīkādanyo na brūyāt,
SA15n1253:311: sa ca sambandhaḥ kvacit pūrvamavaśyaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kvacidadṛśyatve'pi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādvā niścetavyaḥ |
SA15n1253:314: ekaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatrasthena vinā tatrasthaṃ nopapadyate,
SA15n1253:320: tasmāt paridṛśyamānaparikalpyamānayoḥ sati pratibandhe nārthāpattiḥ pramāṇāntaramiti |
SA15n1253:324: yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyamityādirveda nirākaraṇārtha yaḥ pūrvamupanyastaḥ sa evāsyā api prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāya draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1253:325: sāmānyenaivārthāpattau nirākṛtāyāṃ pratyakṣādipūrvakatvalakṣaṇastatprapañco nirasto bhavatyeveti tadarthaṃ na prabandho'bhidhīyate,
SA15n1253:330: tataśca mīmāṃsakopavalgitopamānanirākaraṇārthamupanyasto yo viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo'nupalambhaḥ sa evāsyāpi nirāsārthamupanyasitavyaḥ |
SA15n1253:332: tathā hi yadi ghaṭābhāvo vāstavaḥ prameyabhūto na syāt,
SA15n1253:333: tadā nāstīha ghaṭa iti pratyayaḥ kathamutpadyata iti cet |
SA15n1253:335: nanu yadi kaivalyaṃ praveśasvarūpaṃ tattarhi saghaṭe'pi pradeśe vidyata iti tatrāpi tasya pratyayasya sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n1253:338: kaivalyaṃ tadviviktatvamasaṅkīrṇatvamityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pradeśasya ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya svahetuta utpannasya ghaṭapradeśādanya evātmābhidhīyate |
SA15n1253:339: sa eva cābhāvapratyayaṃ janayatīti kimapareṇābhāvena kartavyam |
SA15n1253:340: nanu ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya pradeśasyeti ghaṭābhāvayuktasya pradeśasyetyuktaṃ bhavatīti cet |
SA15n1253:341: tarhi ghaṭābhāvo'pi ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvaḥ kimabhāvāntareṇa svarūpeṇaiva vā |
SA15n1253:344: yadyevamasahāyaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo'pi paryudāsavṛttyā ghaṭābhāvarūpatvādabhāvaṃ vinaiva ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvo yukta iti kimakāṇḍamāhopuruṣikayā mithyāpralāpenābodhaviklavaṃ śiṣyapudgalamākulayasi |
SA15n1253:361: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiriti |
